about_the_game:
Adds six all new dice colors and designs to roll for those hard-to-roll numbers!

This DLC adds the following dice designs to your Dice-Zee! game instantly:

- Winter White
- Creamy Cocoa
- Blue Ice Dice
- Emotional Rage
- Chrome Classic
- Valiant Violet

If you don't own the dice sets in this DLC package, you can still earn them by grinding DZ coins inside the Dice-Zee! game and purchasing each dice set separately. The DZ coins are only earned by successfully completing the "DZ Event Challenges" that come up randomly while playing both the regular Dice-Zee game and the Quad Dice-Zee game.

If you don't own the dice sets in this DLC package, you can still earn them by grinding DZ coins inside the Dice-Zee! game and purchasing each dice set separately. The DZ coins are only earned by successfully completing the "DZ Event Challenges" that come up randomly while playing both the regular Dice-Zee game and the Quad Dice-Zee game.
name: Dice-Zee! - Dice Pak: "Contemporary Cool"
short_description: Adds new brand new dice sets to your Dice-Zee! game instantly without needing to grind for DZ coins within the game!
